text: Angela Dawn Craig (born February 14, 1972) is an American politician. She is the United States Representative from since 2019. She is a member of the Democratic Party. Craig is openly lesbian. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:American LGBT politicians Category:Lesbians Category:United States representatives from Minnesota Category:Politicians from Arkansas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Angie Craig
